name: You only die twice
description:
This is my first game which I developed within 7 days for the game jam "The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022". The Theme was "Death is only the beginning!". 

It's just a small little game and due to time constraints there are still some glitches. Nevertheless, have fun playing and I would appreciate a comment/feedback.

Use "A" and "D" to move the character. 

Use "E" or left mouse button to swing the sword.
